name: CWMutableConfiguration
desc: Encapsulates a mutable configuration for an AirPort WLAN interface.

items.name: var rememberJoinedNetworks: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to remember all joined Wi-Fi networks unless the user specifies otherwise when joining a particular Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var requireAdministratorForAssociation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to require an administrator password to change networks.

items.name: var requireAdministratorForPower: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to require an administrator password to change the interface power state.
